mapper.select: SELECT course.course_id, course.title, course.description, course.number_of_hours, course.level, course.is_active, teacher.teacher_id, teacher.first_name, teacher.last_name FROM course INNER JOIN teacher ON course.teacher_id = teacher.teacher_id WHERE course.course_id = #{id}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course(title, description, number_of_hours, level, is_active, teacher_id) VALUES(#{title}, #{description}, #{numberOfHours}, #{level}, #{isActive}, #{teacher.teacher_id})
